titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Bertrand Russell, [Sp√§tsommer 1913 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original in The Bertrand Russell Archives der McMaster University; Abschrift (Cambridge Letters, S. 36). Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 32; Cambridge Letters, S. 36; WiC, S. 44).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: This is a secondhand copy of Lichtenberg but I couldn't get another one. I hope you'll enjoy some of it at least. Let me hear from you again.
